Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
boards \boards\ n. 1. the boarding that surrounds an ice hockey rink. [WordNet 1.5]
2. the stage; as, to walk the boards, i.e. to act on stage. [PJC]
3. board examinations (in a profession, as in medicine); -- an informal contraction; as, to take the boards; he flunked the boards. [PJC]
boards n : the boarding that surrounds an ice hockey rink
